description: This script uploads an image file to Anthropic's API and uses an agent to process and generate a response based on the uploaded image.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models and processes responses.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A specific model class for Anthropic's Claude model.

classes.name: Anthropic
classes.description: Client class for interacting with Anthropic's API.

methods.name: download_file
methods.description: Downloads a file from a URL to a specified local path.

methods.name: client.beta.files.upload
methods.description: Uploads a file to Anthropic's beta files API.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent, including images.
